dcterms:description: CrossTask contains 2763 videos with a duration of 213 hours. It consists of 18 different tasks with 7.4 steps per task.

dcterms:description: The COIN dataset spans 12 different domains related to daily life. It contains 11,827 videos with 3.9 steps per video, and is challenging due to the diversity of its tasks and action labels.
dcterms:title: COIN
